com.diffplug.spotless

Class FormatterStepImpl<Key extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.spotless.LazyForwardingEquality<Key>
      • com.diffplug.spotless.FormatterStep.Strict<Key>
        • com.diffplug.spotless.FormatterStepImpl<Key>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormatterStep, Serializable

    public abstract class FormatterStepImpl<Key extends Serializable>
extends FormatterStep.Strict<Key>

    Standard implementation of FormatExtension which cleanly enforces separation of serializable configuration and a pure format function.

    Not an inner-class of FormatterStep so that it can stay entirely private from the API.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • calculateKey

        protected Key calculateKey()
                    throws Exception
        Description copied from class: LazyForwardingEquality

        This function is guaranteed to be called at most once. If the key is never required, then it will never be called at all.

        Throws exception because it’s likely that there will be some IO going on.

        Specified by:
        calculateKey in class LazyForwardingEquality<Key extends Serializable>
